home.subTitle: Hello, I'm Yann Clain
home.pagraph: Passionate about creation and innovation, I put my skills at the service of your projects. Currently looking for a company for an apprenticeship as an IT and Information Systems Expert.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subTitle: To help me better understand your project, please provide as many details as possible. The more information I have, the better I can meet your needs.
